CreateVisitRequest - Class in com.stasroshchenko.clinic.request.visit
Create visit - the doctor user has a data about non registered user, that needs in an appointment with this specialist and creates VisitStatus.ACTIVE visit. -> ACTIVE Made for both encapsulating all doctor user's 'create' visit data, entered in 'create' visit form and sending this data as one object to controller.
